TEXT.TITLE: ADVANCED SYSTEMS <ASY> TO DISTRIBUTE COURSES
TEXT.BODY: Advanced Systems Inc said it acquired distribution rights to three interactive video courses developed by NCR Corp <NCR>. The three courses, for data processing professionals and bankers, are delivered through interactive video, which combines video discs, personal computers and touch-screen monitors. Reuter
